notifications.zone_entered: You have entered a supply drop combat zone. Watch out for other players!
notifications.zone_left: You have left the supply drop combat zone
notifications.crate_not_found: This supply crate no longer exists
notifications.crate_locked: This crate will be ready to open in %s
notifications.no_supply_signal: You don't have a supply signal
notifications.failed_remove_item: Failed to remove supply signal from inventory
notifications.supply_signal_used: A cargo plane is on its way to drop supplies at your location!
notifications.crate_created: Supply crate drop has been initiated!
notifications.gang_crate_dropped: A %s has dropped! This is a great opportunity for your gang
notifications.cooldown_active: You must wait %s seconds before using another supply signal
notifications.missing_item: You don't have a supply signal

chat.title: [Supply Drop]
chat.crate_looted: The supply crate has been looted and removed.
chat.crate_expired: The supply crate expired and was removed.
chat.not_enough_players: Automatic drops are paused — not enough players online.
chat.crate_dropped: Supply plane inbound — %s crate marked on your map.

commands.createdrop: Create a supply crate drop at a random location
commands.createdrophere: Create a supply crate drop at your current location
